event.title: 1829, John Jolly, chief of the Cherokee Nation–West, built

data.event: In 1829, John Jolly, chief of the Cherokee Nation–West, built a home in this area.

event.title: was assigned to Dr. Campbell's store in 1888

data.event: A post office designation of Campbell was assigned to Dr. Campbell's store in 1888.

event.title: 1888, the St. Louis, Iron Mountain and Southern Railway (later the Missouri Pacific Railway) built

data.event: Also in 1888, the St. Louis, Iron Mountain and Southern Railway (later the Missouri Pacific Railway) built a rail line through the settlement.
